SELECT MR.NO, MR.MAIL_NO, MR.RECEIVER, MR.TYPE, MR.READ, MR.STATUS, MR.IMPORTANCE, M.SENDER, M.TITLE, M.CONTENT, M.S_STATUS, M.SEND_DATE, E.EMAIL AS SENDER_EMAIL FROM MAIL_REF MR INNER JOIN MAIL M ON MR.MAIL_NO = M.NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SENDER = E.NO WHERE MR.STATUS = 'N' AND MR.TYPE = 'A' AND mr.receiver = #{memberNo} ORDER BY M.SEND_DATE DESC
